name: Pallof Press
cues: Stand tall holding a dumbbell or ruck at your chest, feet shoulder-width apart
Press the weight straight out from your chest, resisting any rotational pull
Hold briefly at full extension, then return slowly with control
Brace your core and glutes throughout the movement
Perform for the prescribed reps, then switch sides if using a band or cable
Keep your hips and shoulders square
Focus on resisting rotation, not just moving the weight
Start with a light weight to master the movement
variations: Use a resistance band anchored to the side for more anti-rotation challenge
